description:
Wargroove’s very own doggy Commander Caesar, bounds and barks his way into the world of TINY METAL: FULL METAL RUMBLE as part of a FREE-to-download campaign DLC, made possible by a special collaboration with UK-based indie developer Chucklefish.

TINY METAL’s positivity-fuelled Nora must team up with everyone’s favourite magnificent and majestic canine to save the world in a brand-new campaign, which sees the world and denizens of the TINY METAL universe transform into pixelated versions of themselves in the signature Wargroove stylings.
name: Caesar's Rescue
